title: Unemployment rate in Canada , by industry 2019
summary: This chart shows the Unemployment of rate made by Industry in a by industry .
\\n From the chart we see that the Business_building_and_other_support_services Industry was the Unemployment rate Industry in the industry with 7.3 rate .
The next Industry to make the most rate was the Accommodation_and_food_services Industry with 5.5 rate closely followed by the Health_care_and_social_assistance Industry with 1.5 rate .

data.Industry: Forestry fishing mining quarrying oil and gas
Business building and other support services
Finance insurance real estate rental and leasing

gold: This statistic shows the rate of unemployment in Canada in 2019 , by industry . In 2019 , the agricultural industry in Canada had an unemployment rate of 4.4 percent . The health care and social assistance industry had the lowest unemployment rate , at 1.5 percent .
